DOC.brief_summary: The objective investigate bioequivalence 2 dose strength 40 mg 120 mg BI 201335 NA soft gelatine capsule .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Trial 2 Dose Strengths BI 201335 NA Soft Gelatine Capsules
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Healthy male volunteer without clinical significant finding complication 2 . Age : 20 45 year 3 . BMI : 18.5 25.0 kg/m2 4 . Signed informed consent Exclusion criterion : 1 . Any finding medical examination ( include blood pressure , pulse rate electrocardiogram ) deviate normal clinical relevance . 2 . Any evidence clinically relevant concomitant disease accord investigator 's clinical judgement . 3 . Gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunological hormonal disorder . 4 . History jaundice 5 . Surgery gastrointestinal tract ( except appendectomy ) . 6 . Diseases central nervous system ( epilepsy ) psychiatric disorder neurological disorder . 7 . History relevant orthostatic hypotension , faint spell blackout . 8 . Chronic relevant acute infection . 9 . History relevant allergy/hypersensitivity ( include allergy drug excipients ) accord investigator 's clinical judgement . 10 . Intake drug long halflife ( > 24 hour ) within least one month le 10 halflives respective drug prior administration trial 11 . Use drug might reasonably influence result ( pharmacokinetic ) trial within least 10 day prior administration trial . 12 . Participation another trial investigational drug within two month prior administration trial . 13 . Smoking ( > 10 cigarette > 3 cigar > 3 pipes/day ) . 14 . Inability refrain smoke trial . 15 . Alcohol abuse ( 60 g/day : e.g. , 3 middlesized bottle beer , 3 gous [ equivalent 540 mL ] sake ) . 16 . Drug abuse . 17 . Blood donation ( 100 mL within four week prior administration ) . 18 . Excessive physical activity ( within one week prior administration ) . 19 . Any laboratory value outside reference range clinical relevance accord investigator 's clinical judgement . 20 . Any history relevant liver disease ( instance , disturbance liver function , DubinJohnson syndrome , Rotor syndrome , previous liver tumour ) .
